page.title: 13My Family
page.content: My name is Lawrence Mann. There are four people in my{family,}my dad,my mum,my sister and me. We live on an estate at the north end of Loughton. My dad drives to the station and then goes to work in London. My mum doesn't go out to{work}but stays at{home}and does the house work. My dad leaves at 8.00am and comes home at 6.00pm, some- times later. We rarely go out except on birthdays. Because my mother is German every year the whole family goes to Germany at least once, some times three times to visit relations. Every two years we go across to Germany at Christmas and New Year.My sister enjoys{playing}the piano and flute and spends a lot of time reading books. She attends the Davenant Foundation School, and in a year I will be going there for 6 or 7 years schooling.
